solution_line_template: She previously had {strawberries_cartons} cartons + {blueberries_cartons} cartons = <<{strawberries_cartons}+{blueberries_cartons}={cartons_had}>>{cartons_had} cartons of berries.
Emilia needs to buy {cartons_needed_total} cartons - {cartons_had} cartons = <<{cartons_needed_total}-{cartons_had}={cartons_to_buy}>>{cartons_to_buy} cartons of berries.
